name: RetrieveSalesQuotes
description:
Retrieve sales quotes from Xero.

This tool fetches sales quotes from Xero, providing details of quotes issued. Use it to obtain current sales quotations.

parameters.name: xero_tenant_id
parameters.description: Xero tenant identifier for accessing the specific account's data.

value_schema.description: Xero identifier for Tenant

parameters.name: filter_start_date
parameters.description: Filter quotes issued after a specified date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

value_schema.description: Filter for quotes after a particular date

parameters.name: filter_date_to
parameters.description: Filter for sales quotes before a specified date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

value_schema.description: Filter for quotes before a particular date

parameters.name: expiry_date_after
parameters.description: Filter to retrieve quotes expiring after the specified date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: Filter for quotes expiring after a particular date

parameters.name: filter_expiry_date_before
parameters.description: Filter for quotes expiring before a specified date (YYYY-MM-DD).

value_schema.description: Filter for quotes before a particular date

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: Filter the sales quotes by specifying the contact ID to which they belong.

value_schema.description: Filter for quotes belonging to a particular contact

parameters.name: quote_status
parameters.description: Filter quotes by their status (e.g., DRAFT, SENT).

value_schema.description: Filter for quotes of a particular Status

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve, allowing pagination through quotes. Each page returns up to 100 quotes.

value_schema.description: e.g. page=1 – Up to 100 Quotes will be returned in a single API call with line items shown for each quote

parameters.name: order_by_element
parameters.description: Specify the element to order the sales quotes by.

value_schema.description: Order by an any element

parameters.name: quote_number_filter
parameters.description: Filter sales quotes by specifying the quote number (e.g., QU-0001).

value_schema.description: Filter by quote number (e.g. GET https://.../Quotes?QuoteNumber=QU-0001)

parameters.name: modified_since_timestamp
parameters.description: Retrieve records created or modified after this timestamp.

value_schema.description: Only records created or modified since this timestamp will be returned
